summary: Completed comprehensive testing of workshop management application. Backend APIs fully functional (17/17 tests passed). Frontend authentication, navigation, and basic UI working correctly. Identified modal overlay issue in equipment entry form.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay intercepts pointer events preventing form interaction after adding brand
ui_bugs.selector: DialogOverlay with class 'fixed inset-0 z-50 bg-black/80'
ui_bugs.details: After successfully adding a brand, the modal overlay remains active and blocks further interactions. Brand is added successfully but user cannot continue with form.

passed_tests: Backend API authentication (register, login, get current user)
Backend CRUD operations for brands, models, clients, technicians
Backend equipment workflow (create, search, calibrate, deliver)
Frontend login page loading and form elements
Frontend user registration and login flow
Frontend navigation to all 4 modules (Dashboard, Entry, Review, Exit, Summary)
Frontend dashboard module cards and navigation

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (authentication and navigation working, modal issue in equipment entry)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal overlay issue in equipment entry form. After adding brand/model/client, the modal overlay remains active and blocks further form interactions. The data is saved successfully but the UI becomes unusable. Need to ensure modal closes properly after successful operations.
